entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Redundant bound check for span.Length == 0 pattern #67270
    7.0.0
  • Invoke with 'null' arg doesn't work when the target arg is a Nullable byref #67269
  • Arm64: Revisit the heuristics for IO completion poller threads #67266
    7.0.0
  • ListBox.IndexFromPoint returns incorrect result in case of no match #67262
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Ping.SendPingAsync` overloads with `CancellationToken` #67260
  • build no longer works in directories donating dash on Windows #67259
  • ! has shocking behavior #67257
  • [arm64] JIT: Volatile.Write emits full memory barrier for floats #67254
    Future
  • JIT: Vector4 problems on arm64 #67252
    7.0.0
  • EqualityComparer<>.Default is not devirtualized for enums in R2R #67251
    7.0.0
  • Environment Variables not in IConfiguration #67249
  • Arm64: Consider using "DC ZVA" instruction #67244
  • [API Proposal]: [ReadOnly]Span<T>.CreateUnsafe(ref T, int) for compiler-tracked, arbitrary length spans #67242
  • DistributedCacheExtensions adds object caching methods #67237
  • WebAssembly Browser App project fails to run #67236
    7.0.0
  • Installing wasm-tools workload with .NET 7 Preview 2 fails to update the advertising manifests #67235
  • System.Text.Encoding.Tests.apk test failure #67234
    Future
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics tests failed with "almost" empty logs #67233
  • Reloc failures with NativeAOT on Apple Silicon #67232
  • Process.WaitForExit - COMException: The handle is invalid. #67231
  • The converter 'EnumConverter' is not compatible with the type 'System.Nullable`1[FooType]'. #67228
  • .NET 6 RAM consumption on Windows Server 2019 #67268
  • Count_Timeout_ThrowsAfterTooLongExecution test failure #67225
  • Server shutdown prevents large response from being sent to client during draining #67271
  • [Xml Serialization] Possible optimization when writing primitive objects #67222
  • [Xml serialization]ReflectionXmlSerializationWriter is using Array.GetValue method for primary type arrays #67221
  • Test failure XmlSerializerTests.XmlMembersMapping_With_ChoiceIdentifier #67218
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #67217
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/bigevent/bigevent/bigevent.sh #67216
  • Test failure JIT/opt/OSR/tailrecurse/tailrecurse.sh #67215
    7.0.0
  • Finally statement is not always been executed in Linux container #67214

Closed

  • [wasm][debugger] Assertion in `DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests.EvaluateSimpleMethodCallsError` #65744
    7.0.0
  • AppHost requires macOS 10.15 while .net core 3.1 claims to support macOS 10.13+ #61173
    6.0.x
  • Proposal: use ValueTask<TItem> in CacheExtensions.GetOrCreateAsync #67069
  • [FileStream] Multiple FileShare are not working in FileStream #65953
  • `System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn3.11.Tests` crashes due to an assertion on linux/arm64/debug #65817
    7.0.0
  • FileStream sets default encoding to UTF8-BOM in .net6 #67229
  • Resolving path to configuration files #67139
  • Message : No credentials are available in the security package (Rest Sharp C#) #66283
  • Question about Process redirected output and WaitForExit #65377
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Parameters can be passed in when getting services from IServiceProvider #67185
  • Handling of "invalid" HTTP header values results in values being incorrectly reordered #63833
    7.0.0
  • C++/CLI assembly is loaded into isolated AssemblyLoadContext (IsolatedComponentLoadContext) in .NET 6 #61105

PullRequests

Created

  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][workload] add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation again #67267
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67265
    area-Setup
  • Obsolete key blob support on ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey #67264
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update maui iOS build sed command #67263
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Increase timeout on regex count test #67256
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Attempt to fix audit errors in sanitize #67255
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove `ToTimeoutSeconds`.`SendPingAsync` and fix `TimeSpan` behavior #67253
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • perf: wasm: Collect helix logs, and artifacts when the build fails #67248
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: refactor IsOSRLocal #67247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] provisioning: run sanitize.py with python3 #67245
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Introduce abstract PartitionedRateLimiter #67241
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] improve SslStream tests on server 2022 #67240
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add CipherSuitesPolicy support for MsQuic #67239
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed dump path in HTTP stress test #67230
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Preserve parsed & raw header value ordering #67227
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #67226
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [Draft] idea how to improve allocations when serializing primitive types #67223
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow mismatched assembly name and file name #67220
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Account for global stores in hoisting properly #67213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Perform type/layout verification on some mono-config elements to avoid silent failures or crashes later #65449
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Fix SpecialTypeInfo.Byte field #67261
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add some documentation on `GT_CAST`'s semantics #67208
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Issue at most one connection attempt per request #67114
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add struct info to JitDump for INDEX and IND nodes #67135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improved error handling in debug proxy #65828
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.7 #67006
    area-Build-mono
  • [MAUI][PERF] Maui Perf add iOS Podcast SOD Tests #67165
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67066
    area-Setup
  • Remove unnecessary remark from `ObservableCollection.CollectionChanged` #67250
    documentation, area-System.Collections
  • Obsolete ToXmlString and FromXmlString on ECC types #67246
    area-System.Security, breaking-change
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Allow caller-allocated buffer for `CustomTypeMarshaller` to be `Span` of any unmanaged type for Value marshalling #67172
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] MonoProxy.cs: Avoid some errors by pre-emptively checking #67243
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Improve AOT time by better utilizing the cores #67195
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [PERF] Added --logbuildoutput to microbenchmark runs. #67111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix a few issues with merged wrappers uncovered by local testing #67211
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • add gregsdennis to area-system-text-json #67224
    community-contribution
  • Draft for x ^ 0 opt (#65071) #65072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Port SequenceEqual to crossplat Vectors, optimize vector compare on x64 #67202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Perform reachability analysis before codegen #66967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix loop cloning of array of struct with array field #67130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1686932 #67177
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid pre-allocating large arrays in some scenarios for Enumerable.Chunk #67210
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #67054
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use the stapled OCSP response from TLS, when available. #67011
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove `IsEmpty` workaround in `Span` and `ReadOnlySpan` #66865
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Make the cross-component build just another invocation of the build-runtime script #67108
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Http` #66891
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add support for creating delegates to static virtual methods #66936
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add \<para> tags to remarks comments #67173
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Makes GetChildKeys more efficient #67186
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Do not call into MsQuic inside a lock #67037
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #66794
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Avoid allocating a delegate in OptionsMonitor.Get() when possible. #66688
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67118
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix missing side effect flags on HWI nodes #67206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Do not generate `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #66251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging perf/wasm/aot #66973
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • feat: Add support for emscripten module exports #66868
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Port Access violation occurring in System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation fix from .netfx to .net-core #66726
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml (DRAFT) #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66958
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [mono] Remove mono-perfcounters.c and most of mono-counters.c #66986
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Rely on PGO for isinst/castclass #65922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Double Vector128 for SpanHelpers.IndexOf(byte,byte,int) on ARM64 #66993
    area-System.Memory
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Runtime no longer needs to enable preview features #67162
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx (#63803) #67007
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67145
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Improve exception thrown when constructing SslCertificateTrust #66763
  • JIT: Optimize unused array allocations #67205
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix read of image_info while raising image_unload event #67138
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono, community-contribution
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix r4 r8 numbers #66979
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debuger tests refactor 63667 #63730
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When publishing the nuget dll is not updated if the nuget version is downgraded #24595
  • Fix unstable test build #24592
  • '--no-build' flag messes with 'dotnet run' error messages #24591
  • Chinese Localization(zh-CN) Resource dll is missing when using dotnet build/publish using CLI #24580
  • Automatically build corresponding version XML data by ToolsVersion. #24579
  • Icon for dotnet-CLI #24578

Closed

  • Build failed with NETSDK1177 error #24593
  • runtimesettings.dev.json is gone ; surprising breakage #24427

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support to turn off signature verification for workload commands #24590
    Area-Workloads
  • Add a fabricbot.json file to auto close issues with "Area-NuGet" label #24589
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Cherry pick #24130 #24562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pin the compiler version in RSG to an exact version #24130
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Revert 23358 #24561
  • Revert #23358 #24538
  • Handle the error case where the sdk-manifests folder is not present a… #24577
  • Enable arm64 targeting for .Net Framework 4.8.1 and newer #24566
    Area-NetSDK
  • changed names of `dotnet new` providers #24565
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.3xx] changed names of `dotnet new` providers #24582
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Workload feature band fallback with rollback files #24545
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1686624 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects. #24139
    Area-WebSDK
  • Adding Package Validation support for cases where PackageId is different than AssemblyName #24439
  • Update to the 6.0.3 runtime for preview 3 #24563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • SDK integration via BundledNetCoreApp #24550
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Relax restrictions on braces on interpolated raw strings. #5960

Closed

  • Type argument inference failing with unambiguous method group #5962

PullRequests

Created

  • Specify behavior of default `: this()` initializer with struct field initializers #5961
  • Ref fields major revision #5959

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] All requests for opened source generated documents fail #60434
  • Test plan for UnsignedRightShift feature #60433
  • System.ArgumentException in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.OperationMapBuilder #60424
  • SemanticModel ignores evaluation context introduced by checked/unchecked expression #60419
  • Add API to incrementally find usages of a type. #60417

Closed

  • False positive in IDE0078 (use of pattern matching) #57199
    17.3
  • Analyzer to check line length does not exceed predefined value. #60422
  • Investigate if adding a quote should not trigger quote-completion in the case that it would terminate an existing string. #59178
    17.2
  • This code compiles in 3.x but doesn't compile in 4.x #60418
  • [Responsiveness] Roslyn initialization is forced onto the UI thread, forcing the project system to synchronize initialize it (6.9% of solution open) #55297
    17.2
  • Suggestion to remove a delegate cast results in warning #60423
  • Please support highlighted fields and attributes #60180
    Backlog
  • IDE0078 diagnostic shows up without the code fix in CSharp CodeStyle NuGet package #45569
    Backlog
  • `await` is not highlighted in top-level statements when clicked #60400
    17.3
  • Odd behaviour with async method declaration: bad keyword suggestion #60340
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add UnsignedRightShift feature to "Language Feature Status.md" #60435
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Versions.props and PublishData.json for 17.2 P3 snap #60432
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main-vs-deps #60431
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to release/dev17.2 #60430
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #60429
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Port 'Top Level Statements' code style PR to 17.3 #60426
    Area-IDE
  • Support adding new assembly level attributes with SyntaxGenerator when some already exist in the document #60425
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60415
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Avoid checking HasValue in nullable comparison for non-default constants #60405
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support SetsRequiredMembersAttribute #60392
    Area-Compilers
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Add BoundArrayInitialization.IsInferred #60391
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support lambdas and local functions, eliminate duplicate code #60335
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move StackTraceAnalyzer over to VirtualCharSequence #60404
    Area-IDE
  • Add Rebuild badge to README #60298
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Features/utf8 string literals #59774
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • [LSP] Remove the majority of usages of client name. #60357
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • [semi-auto-props]: Disallow 'nameof(field)' #60384
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add feature to convert from top-level-statements to Program.Main form #60383
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Pause taggers when they are not visible. #60371
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unreported telemetry #60321
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce interface with static abstract BindAsync method for custom bound parameters of route handler delegates #40927
    .NET 7 Planning
  • URL Protocol Issue in the HTML Output with Razor Engine #40923
  • Don't invert the UseProgramMain option in project templates in Visual Studio #40917
    7.0-preview4
  • `JsonPatchDocument.ApplyTo` should support `DateOnly` data type #40916
  • Dev certificate inside docker container is not valid #40910
  • Is .net core compatible with IIS Webdav module ? #40903

Closed

  • W3CLogger tests pass despite using DateTime.Now instead of DateTime.UtcNow #40844
  • Add perf test for endpoint filter vs. no endpoint filter #40655
    7.0-preview3
  • Use top level statements option will be unlocalized in Visual Studio #40918
  • Add template option to generate explicit Program class with Main method instead of top-level statements #40877
    7.0-preview4
  • Ignore Null Properties #40751
  • IResult support in MVC #40639
    7.0-preview4
  • Syntax highlighting & Intellisense/code completion stops working on Blazor Razor components #40879
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • TypeScript break points not hit after moving corresponding js file out of wwwroot folder to an authorized folder #40889
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task #40198
    Backlog
  • WebApplicationOptions.WebRootPath is ignored if a wwwroot folder exists #40613
  • Razor error RZ2005 on one file (/pages/Error.cshtml) #40901

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement IProvideEndpointMetadata & IProvideEndpointParameterMetadata #40926
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime
  • Fix W3CLogger tests #40922
    area-runtime
  • Remove Mono specific Code #40920
    community-contribution
  • Add RouteHandlerContext as parameter to IRouteHandlerFilter.InvokeAsync #40919
    area-runtime
  • Fix Component Governance bugs #40915
  • RefactoringDictionaryHolderStruct #40909
    community-contribution
  • Add trimming guidance for developers #40902
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Skip failing test on redhat #40913
    area-security, 7.0-preview3
  • Use Microsoft.JSInterop to calculate package version #40921
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Prevent razor pages from being packed in UI nupkg #40839
    area-identity, 7.0-preview3
  • [Blazor] Cleanup DotnetDispatcher.cs #40906
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Add option to project templates to use Program.Main instead of top-level statements #40886
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Add option to enable binlogs for manual internal builds #40914
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-preview.4.22175.5 #40911
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Sync shared code from runtime #40890
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b007c54` to `af29db7` #40907
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Harden AssertRecycle #40878
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task (#40198) #40533
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40898
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Virtual method for OnCheckSlidingExpiration #40900
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add `AddStackExchangeRedisCache` & `AddHsts` overload #40689
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Unquarantine test #40888
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Increase a few IIS test timeouts #40884
    area-runtime
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Trim Http.Extensions #40561
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Joining common stacks like parallel stacks #530
    .NET 7.0
  • dumpasync should be able to filter stacks based on the bottom most frame #533
    .NET 7.0
  • Allow creating multiple eventcounter instances with the same name, at runtime #1125
    Future

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add single file debugging support to dbgshim #2941

Updated

  • Modify hosting to account for system assemblies in 5.0+ runtimes #2930

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Project using MultiPage migrated from Xamarin faults on MAUI #5622
  • [WinUI] Margin not applied for CollectionView items on WinUI #5621
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Shell BackButtonBehavior IconOverride image won't load in iOS #5619
  • If CollectionView is assigned a new handler the header control won't disconnect from the previous CollectionView #5616
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • BottomTabs on Android shell is currently recreating the Page Handler with each navigation #5615
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Pinch to Gesture is not working for Content View, when adding it to a scroll view #5614
  • Remove usages of `BackQueue` from `StackNavigationManager` #5613
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Touch scroll is not working in a scroll view when adding pinch gesture to the child. #5612
  • TLS 1.2 in android option (it does not exists in VS Preview 17.1) #5604
  • Shell view is not working properly. #5603

Closed

  • Hot Restart for iOS not working in Preview 17.2.1 #5605
  • RadioButtonGroup.SelectedValue not triggered (windows app) #5298
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • ScrollView grows infinitely inside StackLayout #5442
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • XamlC should optimize CornerRadiusTypeConverter and FontSizeConverter ConvertFromInvariantString #5018
    6.0.300
  • ListView, TableView crashes on windows #5551
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Border control is not updated, while it's width and height changed. #5464
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • opacity is ignored for Image background #5568
  • Problems with Button and ImageButton #5347
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Screenshot (Essentials API) not working in Windows platform #5378
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • WebRTC + MAUI #3394
  • After upgrade to 2022 17.2 Preview 2 margin and padding require XAML format on compile, CSS format works after hot swapping when app is running #5556

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Label.VerticalTextAlignment on Windows #5623
  • [X] Optimise OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️

Merged

  • Reduce the insertion stage timeout to 1 min #5620
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update MacOS Repo Setup Instructions #5525
    area/setup 🪄
  • [X] Compile FontSizeConverter #5338
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Move missing styles over to controls from compat #5617
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Implement Padding property in ImageButtonHandler #4665
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Android] Fix issue updating Border size #5608
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Update MAUI Graphics #5552
    area/drawing ✏️, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Android] Fix Opacity property in Image #5607
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Housekeeping] Pending ImageButton CornerRadius changes #5610
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Update README.md #5609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Add Microsoft.Maui.Graphics to the MAUI workload #5577
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [android] update to the latest AndroidX packages #5588
    platform/android 🤖, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Improved non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #5313
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Made MaxLength property consistent across all platforms #5581
    area/controls 🎮
  • Better VSMac workaround #5584
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Clip image to ImageView bounds when using CenterCrop (AspectFill) #5589
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, control-image

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GroupBy one field, selecting a sub collection for the data that is grouped and paging the groupby return no result for the sub collection. #27721
  • Groub by not working at all #27717
  • Allow using retry policies on explicit transactions using savepoints? #27716

Closed

  • Where clause using List.Contains with one elements results in = instead of IN #27722
  • What causes differences in verbosity between IDesignTimeDbContextFactory class library and console application project? #27704
  • Enabling TPT with default table name. #27702
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite low query performance #27693
  • FileLoadException: System.Runtime v6.0.0 when using scaffolder with latest dotnet-7 feed dotnet-ef tool. #27660
    7.0.0
  • efbundle tries to make a connection to the OnConfiguring connection string despite using --connection parameter #27510

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove needless package references in EFCore. #27720

Merged

  • Update tool to roll forward to latest major version of runtime installed. #27671
    community-contribution
